KR: 말씀 드렸었다시피.. 전 손재주가 좀 좋아서, 어릴 때 부터 관심이 많았어요.{nl}연금술, 마법, 약재.. 그 서큐버스의 눈을 좀 압니다!{nl}대성당의 축복을 간직한 예쁜 목걸이가 탐이 나서 서큐버스가 제 눈에 넣어버린 그 눈!{nl}제가 그걸로 다시 목걸이를 만들어 드릴게요!
EN: Like I said.. I had a talent in doing with my hands so I was interested since I was young. {nl} Alchemy, magic, medicine... I know a bit about the eyes of the Succubus! {nl} It's the eyes that the Succubus put in my eyes in envy of the pretty necklace bearing the blessing of the cathedral! {nl} I'll make you a  necklace with it again!
